description: An attacker injects malicious code into a legitimate process to evade detection and gain access to system resources.
mitigation: Implement system-wide or application-specific protections that prevent or detect process injection techniques.

description: An attacker leverages a UAC bypass technique to escalate privileges and gain administrative access.
mitigation: Implement best practices for UAC configuration, including setting it to 'Always notify' and blocking unauthorized changes to UAC settings.

description: An attacker sends a spearphishing email with a malicious attachment to a target, enticing them to open it and execute the attached code.
mitigation: Train employees on email security best practices, including how to identify and report suspicious emails.

description: An attacker exploits a vulnerability in a Linux system to gain persistent access and maintain control over the target.
mitigation: Apply security patches promptly and keep systems up to date with the latest software versions.

description: An attacker injects a malicious DLL into a legitimate process to execute code and evade detection.
mitigation: Implement system-wide or application-specific protections that prevent or detect DLL injection techniques.
